website_summaries.verdict: Healthy, easily portable baby food purees that you can feel good about giving to your child.
pros: Made of 100% organic fruits and vegetables
Provides a full serving of fruits and vegetables
Squeezable pouch that's easy for young children to use
Taste that's well liked by kids and adults alike
cons: Not all of the flavors go over well with kids

customer_reviews.title: Mold and unsealed caps
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived with all unsealed caps. Mold was growing from pouches. My concern is that they look to have busted at the top, revealing that the mold was there during filling and continued to grow but ran out of space. So gross!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Ann

customer_reviews.title: NOT JUST FOR BABIES
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. Yummy. Great healthy pick me up. Keep in car for emergencies. Great for addition to lunch at work. Quick breakfast. Midnight snack. A little difficult to open. I stay on a low calorie diet year round because of a lower metabolism as I get older. So I try to make every bite count with nutritional value. I am mostly vegetarian/vegan as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fleurette Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Convenient healthy snack on the go, for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I bumped into this when my kid was less than 1yo, and loved it. I tried other brands, but even after 6 years Peter Rabbit is still my kid favorite, and my husband and I love it too! Whenever we’re on the go for a few hours, I always make sure to carry a couple of pouches with me, along with other snacks. Unlike bananas, strawberries, and other fruits, it won’t get smashed in your purse, nor it won’t go bad. It’s an extra serving of organic veggies, a smoothie if that’s how you want to call it, conveniently packed for a day out, when you can’t carry a bowl of whole veggies with you.
customer_reviews.author: LARA

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as store bought.
customer_reviews.text: The apple pea and spinach pouches have different nutritional labels than the ones bought from whole foods. Also, the nutritional label shown in the picture are also different than what I received.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Beware-serious problems with packaging
customer_reviews.text: When this product arrived, some of the pouches had ruptured, coating everything in slimy, molding baby food. I had trouble telling which packages were actually unsealed, so I threw the whole thing away. Amazon sent a replacement for free, but the replacement pouches had also popped. Several pouches had white mold around the tops, so I'm tossing this one out as well. I will not purchase from this manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: LCaray

customer_reviews.title: Citrullinemia Type I
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has Citrullinemia Type I and he's is only the second person in the world with this specific type. Well he has a diet that has to be maintained very carefully. He is only allowed fruits and vegetables, we have to stay away from protein. Thanks to this our grandson really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta (Yodichkas) Michael

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product received
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two boxes of these pouches because of the quality ingredients and positive reviews. Unfortunately, much like other reviews, one of boxes I received contained a ruptured pouch or two that had spilled all over the box. Possibly growing mold but unsure due to the color of the pouch contents also being green. One star back for the quick and easy refund.
customer_reviews.author: LTG

customer_reviews.title: I think the taste is great and the ingredients are great
customer_reviews.text: I think the taste is great and the ingredients are great. However, trying to convince a 5 year old to eat a green gooey substance is very difficult. He likes all of the other Peter Rabbit Organics products except for this one. I myself even found the color to be a little unappealing. I know it's filled with spinach and peas which ultimately gives it the green color but isn't there some other fruit or veggie that you could mix it with to give it a different color? My son would rather eat peas and spinach as apposed to this green goo. Luckily we've put it in his smoothies and he doesn't know the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B. Little

customer_reviews.title: love this product brand
customer_reviews.text: love this product brand. it and clearly crafted and plum are the best ive found for my little one in terms of getting great healty eating options that taste great. my son barely notices all the good stuff in there because it taste great. he never refuses any that i give him unlike with other pouch brands that i did not mention.
customer_reviews.author: Truthfully

customer_reviews.title: Nutrition label incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the pea, spinach and apple puree. I like to keep the sugar content of my sons packets under 10g. Picture shows 9g of sugar and the label of what i received is 12g of sugar. Second time this has happened but the other was a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mancini

customer_reviews.title: Fruits & Vegetables source that won't go bad.
customer_reviews.text: I love eating healthy but I'm tired of that 4-5 day window of freshness that most produce seems to have. So I snag these via subscribe & save, and they are SO CONVENIENT- so yes, you pay a slight premium for that convenience- but what is the cost of your time in going to the grocery store, picking out produce, and then 15% of it going to waste? I buy multiple cases- I put one in my closet, one in my car, one the office- never more do I need to worry about skipping a meal or getting my main food groups covered. Taste is great too!
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Damaged with dried on puree
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box to find puncture holes in more than one pouch — and the purée had leaked all over other packages in the box. Disappointed— have to toss out the entire box.
customer_reviews.author: Bracy Liuznik

customer_reviews.title: Expire date is too soon
customer_reviews.text: Got the package today and will expire in a month
customer_reviews.author: Pucca

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I hoped and expected it to be. The pouch is not only easy to grab on my way out the door to work, but it's also easy to consume quickly, on a break. This is the most convenient vegetable delivery device I have ever encountered. Which means that when I have these, I eat more vegetables. I don't know if I'd say that I enjoy the taste, but I definitely don't dislike it. Plus, it's gone in about 10 seconds, so the taste is almost irrelevant. This is exactly what I was hoping for when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J Albert

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt likes it
customer_reviews.text: My son wont eat this food at all. It doesnt taste good and he doesnt like it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Evans

customer_reviews.title: I ended up eating them
customer_reviews.text: These don't taste terrible but the pea flavor is dominant. I ended up eating them because neither my 3 year old or my 10 year old would have any more than the first two tastes. They just plain didn't like the pea flavor. So, I toss them in my lunch for work - what the heck. Minus 2 stars because my kids said no way and 3 remaining because it's just a good idea otherwise and my work lunches have been rather unique since my order.
customer_reviews.author: quizzy2

customer_reviews.title: My son liked it!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old tried this for the first time the other day and he really liked it! That is great since he is such a picky eater. I am a huge fan of this brand because of the simplicity of their product (they don't add a lot of unnecessary things, like sugar or salt) and because it is completely organic and made in the USA. I love that my son is eating healthy, tasty foods. I have ordered another variety just now; hopefully he will like that one just as much. : )
customer_reviews.author: kimberly.coale

customer_reviews.title: only way my 20 month old will eat green veggies!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these. She won't eat broccoli, peas, spinach, etc. unless they are pureed or in these pouches. These make a great packable snack and I know she's getting some good nutrition in. A note to parents of younger children - my daughter only recently figured out how to squeeze the pouch to eat one of these. Have patience if your kiddo is younger! Subscribe and save is a great way to keep a steady supply of these around!
customer_reviews.author: A. Wear

customer_reviews.title: My Kid is Killing it
customer_reviews.text: I love to see my boy choke one of these down! It makes me feel good! And it must be good, because my boy is picky!
customer_reviews.author: Kenyone L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for on-the-go-people!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these on a whim after seeing a friend consuming apple sauce out of a similar contraption. I'm a full time ER nurse, and sometimes there just isn't time to eat at all at work, aside from picking at the junk food people bring in to share. These pouches are great, even at room temperature. It gives me a quick and healthy energy boost without any fuss at all! Already have a few other co-workers hooked. Just ordered almost every flavor they sell, and they are all delicious in their own way :)
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: He calls them "apple sauce" but he definitely knows the yellow one tastes better than the green one
customer_reviews.text: This has been a staple diaper bag snack since my son was 1 (now 2.5 years). He calls them "apple sauce" but he definitely knows the yellow one tastes better than the green one. He'll eat it if he's really hungry and he gets a hidden dose of veggies too which is great. I get these as part of subscribe and save membership with 20% off which makes it a great price.
customer_reviews.author: KTP

customer_reviews.title: Yummm
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this with subscribe and save. A truly affordable way to buy these pouches. My 15 month old loves it. She gulped it down and said yummm! Only a few ingredients, organic and not just full of filler fruit like a lot of other pouches, makes this a great on the go nutritional snack that is free of chemical ingredients and is healthy
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: My baby LOVES this - the only vegetable I can het her to eat
customer_reviews.text: We have tried all sorts of squeeze pouch veggies and this is the only one my daughter will eat. I think the apple is strong enough that the spinach and pea don't bother her. I actually started making this combination in my blender at home with apple sauce, frozen spinach and frozen peas and it is great and much cheaper than buying these. We still buy these to have on the go though.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Piper Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients and great taste.
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and texture plus a whole serving of vegetables! Kids love it too.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Super yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Super yummy! My 19-month-old prefers this combination (pea, spinach, apple) to any fruit pack and sometimes finishes the whole pouch in one go. P.S. actually, I love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for all!
customer_reviews.text: Wearing Invisalign, needed a way to eat healthy while on the go & found these. Awesome packaging and a great product that tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: but he grew out of them and now I mix a packet with my dog's kibble which coats it nicely and entices her to eat it
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was ordering these for my baby, but he grew out of them and now I mix a packet with my dog's kibble which coats it nicely and entices her to eat it. She is also getting the added benefit of fiber form the vegetables, which helps her digestion. Occasionally I use these to sneak in veggies to my son's food.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Finally Eating Vegetables
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old will not eat any vegetables right now. He barely eats anything! But he loves all things fruit, and these are no exception. I have also bought Peter Rabbit Organics Sweet Potato/Corn/Apple and Carrot/Squash/Apple blend. He eats them all with no problem. I'm so glad to be able to get him to eat a vegetable when I can't get him to eat it off his plate.
customer_reviews.author: Barlow Girl

customer_reviews.title: Pea, Spinach, and Apple
customer_reviews.text: We are a HUGE fan of organic fruit and veggie pouches in our house. I specifically love Peter Rabbit Organics because they have no preservatives besides lemon juice. My daughter really likes this flavor and I love that she gets more greens in her diet! I wish Amazon had a better selection/price on the other flavors!
customer_reviews.author: WLAHanos

customer_reviews.title: Taste very good. My kid likes it too.
customer_reviews.text: Our kid loves vegetables, particularly peas. I like that there is nothing but the fruit and vegetables on the label in this food. The taste really is very good. We use this as a convenient back up to the food we prepare for him and freeze in ice cube trays. Sometimes I think, heck, just feed him this ... and, you know, milk.
customer_reviews.author: Kael Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: My 2yr old enjoys these.
customer_reviews.text: My 2yr old loves these. They are large pouches so you get more product than alot of other brands on the market.
customer_reviews.author: G.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: This a convenient and delicious way to get greens in my diet. I put them in golf bag cooler for snack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for on the go snacks
customer_reviews.text: My children are 8 and 6 and they are still eating these! They are perfect for on the go snacks, I always have 2 in my bag. We buy several flavors and my children love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Leibbrandt

customer_reviews.title: My littles LOVE these. And
customer_reviews.text: My littles LOVE these. And, I have a reluctant eater with stomach trouble. She's looking much healthier now that she is consuming larger quantities of fruits and vegetables. She will eat them off her plate, and we don't give her junk food for extra calories, but she just wasn't getting enough. These make it easy for her to down a bunch all at once. Definitely a win win.
customer_reviews.author: MamaT

customer_reviews.title: They don't love all the squeeze packs but they do seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month olds still eat some of the baby food. They don't love all the squeeze packs but they do seem to eat this one. Generally I think the Peter Rabbit ones have a better consistency. I find some of the other brands too watery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little too watery
customer_reviews.text: Product was good, but not very spoonable. I feel like it was a lit more watery than the version I purchased in store. If you are ok with just eating it from the pouch then this will work. But not for eating with a spoon. Flavor is good.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy G.

customer_reviews.title: My little ones love these and I am finding it hard to find ...
customer_reviews.text: My little ones love these and I am finding it hard to find them at the grocery store. Being able to order them on Amazon is really helpful. These are a great way to get some veggies in.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: I love how easy these are to carry around in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy these are to carry around in a diaper bag. They make an excellent snack during snack time. I feel better giving one of these pouches for a snack than a pretzel when we are out shopping. The taste is not bad either since I had to try them.
customer_reviews.author: R & R Sloan

customer_reviews.title: My kid hates peas!
customer_reviews.text: If your child is anything like mine, he or she does not like vegetables and it's a constant struggle to get them to even try a bite. The Peter Rabbit Organics makes getting kids to eat their veggies a problem no more! With apple as the main ingredient and an applesauce consistency, my son will finally eat something I want him to. The pouches are convenient to pack and go. Great line of kid's food products.
customer_reviews.author: New Mommy

customer_reviews.title: and I love giving them to him because that means he's getting ...
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old loves these things, and I love giving them to him because that means he's getting some of his vegetables. It's about one of these a day, and never complains. Quality ingredients, and good taste
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to like this some days and not others
customer_reviews.text: Daughter ate it on occasion. Seemed to like this some days and not others.
customer_reviews.author: Chase's Mom

customer_reviews.title: My toddler LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: ...and I love that they have 2 veggies and 1 fruit in them. I wish that fruit wasn't the first ingredient, but oh well, not that big of a deal. I'm just grateful for a healthy organic snack that I can throw in my purse when we're on the go!
customer_reviews.author: luvedmama

customer_reviews.title: Veggies and protein
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves these and it's so easy to get veggies into the kids this way. These pouches also have a fair amount of protein so if it is all I can get them to eat, I'm ok with it. A great snack on the go for my older child as well
customer_reviews.author: R. Koscielniak

customer_reviews.title: They are so easy to take because they don't need refrigerating
customer_reviews.text: I eat these as a snack after or during my workouts. They are so easy to take because they don't need refrigerating, although they are more refreshing when refrigerated. I got my girlfriend hooked on these now, too :-)
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this flavor. I made my own baby food and now my daughter is eating solids, but I like to have these as back up to take places when we are away from home. She likes that she can eat them herself and I like that there are vegetables in it too.
customer_reviews.author: Cos

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again and again
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. No additives and local to us. It's important for me to know what my son is eating and he loves them. Great price for being such a handy on the go treat
customer_reviews.author: Kyleigh R Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great taste! Our son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old is not big on vegetables which is so frustrating. We went back to pouches to try to get some wholesome veggies into him. He loves peter rabbit and I love that the spinach pea apple flavor is actually green and not mostly apples like some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: moofy818

customer_reviews.title: Single Father needs all the help he can get...
customer_reviews.text: I am loving being a father... and despite my best culinary attempts, pasta with olive oil or mac'n'cheese; how do I get her to eat the veggies? I bought this as a snack, but after last nights overly cooked veggies, found that they can be good side dishes as well. My little one likes the the green A LOT vs the yellow, just bought the brown; we will let you know. So far, HUGE success. Great for lunch on the go or to make up for a single man's cooking. Either way a must have in winning the war that is meal time with a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: JBEKuykendall

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these pouches
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these pouches....helps that this contains the greens I want them to eat. I have these always on hand.
customer_reviews.author: MVB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, healthy delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Peter Rabbit organics works great for my husband who had and still is having extensive dental work done. It's a lot easier on me; I don't need to make his puree every meal now. Thanks so much! You're a real blessing.
customer_reviews.author: Jean E. Marcoux-Annis

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these, they are easy to take with us ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these, they are easy to take with us on outings and I know they are a healthy alternative to junk food. I use these for my older children as I can sneak in some veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kaylorboys

customer_reviews.title: Great for Smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: I take two of these and a few ounces of water.... mix them up in my daughter's straw cups, and VOILA... a healthy smoothie, that they think is a treat, so shhhh, dont tell them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Peter Rabbit!
customer_reviews.text: For adults with diet issues that do not allow them to eat fresh fruits, salads or vegetables, these organic products of pureed fruit and vegetables are the answer. This is one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M. Kinney

customer_reviews.title: The ingredient list is not the same as shown on ...
customer_reviews.text: The ingredient list is not the same as shown on the website. My baby tried it once and vomit after a few hours. I am not giving it to her anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Lidiya Zahulyayeva

customer_reviews.title: For the low amount of calories, these sure add ...
customer_reviews.text: For the low amount of calories, these sure add a lot of weight to your backpack. I will be leaving these at home.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: BEST one of all the pouches in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ingredients and the lightly sweet flavor. My 3 year old no longer likes this one but my 16 month old still enjoys it. I like the less-fruity flavor for cultivating a wider palate.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, like the blend
customer_reviews.text: Baby seems to like the blend of different flavors and I appreciate that it's exposing her to new tastes slowly. Bring a spoon; despite the pack it's messy.
customer_reviews.author: georgina

customer_reviews.title: FYI
customer_reviews.text: Make sure your kiddo likes this flavor before buying. It is very spinachy tasting. I can't get anyone to eat it room temp or cold. I guess I'll be eating them.
customer_reviews.author: ELJM

customer_reviews.title: My daughter likes it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes it and it has good things on it...
customer_reviews.author: Mafiq9

customer_reviews.title: I Use this Myself
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a good idea to have some good, healthful and organic food for snacks. This is a good way to get that and it's satisfying and a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Katwilm

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to give to my grand daughter when we're taking trips, picnics, etc. It is so convenient to just grab and take and she loves it. No problem getting her to eat her veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Welch

customer_reviews.title: Not the tastiest!
customer_reviews.text: My baby doesn't like the taste of these so I can never get him to finish a whole pouch. I canceled my subscription because he just wasted them.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for car rides!
customer_reviews.text: My girls loved these on our long car ride! We were going from NJ to CA and it was such a quick, easy, mess-free, and healthy road snack. I would 100% purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Boobiemilkguru

customer_reviews.title: ... really wanted these but now he says he doesn't like them and will not eat them
customer_reviews.text: My son really wanted these but now he says he doesn't like them and will not eat them. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: food on the go
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this food comes packaged. It is so easy to feed my triplets while I wait on my oldest child to get done with cheer leading. My triplets love the food which makes feeding them a lot eaiser since they don't fuss about what they are eating.
customer_reviews.author: data1701

customer_reviews.title: Love this snack
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these!!!!! I don't know what i would do without them, they are a great health snack! both my girls suck them down and it's a veggie mix! awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky H

customer_reviews.title: Great for veggie haters
customer_reviews.text: My son has recently decided he hates veggies but loves to eat these. They seem to have a mild veggie flavor but packs in the nutrition
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get in veggies
customer_reviews.text: These are our go to snacks! My daughter loves them and I feel great about giving them to her. Its easy and she is getting more fruits and veggies that makes every mom smile.
customer_reviews.author: AtHomeShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get greens
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old sucks these things right down even though she will not touch greens just sitting on her plate. Any way she gets those greens I'll take!
customer_reviews.author: V. Lease

customer_reviews.title: My 3 yr old son loves these and I love them because of the vegetables in them
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old son loves these and I love them because of the vegetables in them. It works great in his lunch and even better because it is organic. They have become a staple in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin C.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s heakthy, but my kids struggle to finish this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: R Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Product info needs updating!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I was looking for easy foods with higher iron contents for my 13 month old. The picture shows 8% daily value for iron; however the real deal only has 4%!! And the real deal has organic lemon juice concentrate as an added ingredient. The info needs to be updated!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney P.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pouch
customer_reviews.text: My 20-month old sons LOVE this flavor. It is their go-to pouch. It is definitely on the sweet side, but I suppose that's why they like it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great baby food, great price-this is such a better price than I can find any of these in stores and it's organic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What can i do with this now?!
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 yo didn't care for this... I plan to try to mix into other foods so he wont notice and it wont be wasted....
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: I really like being able to purchase these organic products for my child. He loves them and it's a great way to get him to eat some veggies during the day. Super saver is awesome because it ends up costing a lot less then buying them at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Claire M. Murtagh

customer_reviews.title: The pouch feature is nice. My daughter often likes to squeeze the pouch ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these pea, spinach, and apple puree pouches. They are a green color, and definitely do have a bit of vegetable flavor. However, she likes them anyway. The pouch feature is nice. My daughter often likes to squeeze the pouch into a bowl and eat it with a spoon, which negates a bit of the convenience and neatness factor. I enjoy that I am able to give her a sweet that still packs a bit of a veggie punch. Minus one star because even with Subscribe and Save discount, they seem expensive for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best in the market!
customer_reviews.text: My son has primarily only liked this brand of baby food! This one in general tastes very good, I try everything before I have my son eat it and he begs for these! Highly reccomend !
customer_reviews.author: jamie a.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Supposedly these are for kids but I eat them on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 7

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite food pouch.
customer_reviews.text: This is our go-to food pouch for going out to dinner or on the go. It pairs great with a Boon spoon for ease in feeding. My kid loves the taste and gets excited when he sees the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: tmr13

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! He eats them all the time even asks for them! I've tried other pouches but he won't eat them
customer_reviews.author: yankeegirl

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I love how easy it is to use and it's delicious too! Perfect for traveling. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Veggies in fruit sauce-what brilliance!
customer_reviews.text: Both my girls, ages 3 and 9 love these fruit and veg sauces. And they go in my car, bag, wherever we go. Such a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: N. Albanese-levin

customer_reviews.title: love 'em
customer_reviews.text: selected this product as a way to get my ever-more-picky toddler to eat some veggies. she loves the packages, and i love how easy it is for her to self-feed with them. i wish that spinach and peas were the first ingredient (instead of apples), but otherwise, thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Clawson

customer_reviews.title: Puree too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I got this for me for the Pea/Spinach but the Apple Puree made it too sweet.
customer_reviews.author: MeMary77

customer_reviews.title: love them on subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: buy these on subscribe and save...my kids both 3 and 1 love them.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Easy to eat on the go. It tastes mostly like peas, but it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Yum.
customer_reviews.text: Kiddo loves these, and there are a minimum number of ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this brand great snack for on the go
customer_reviews.author: carbana

customer_reviews.title: Great Veg & Thickened Liquid
customer_reviews.text: I have kids who need extra iron and who need to have liquids thickened to drink them- this snack fits the bill as something we can take-along when we are out. In addition to being a great package, the taste is great and gets the extra vegetables into my kids when they are on the go. SO awesome to find a healthy take-along for my kids!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen K4kids

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store and serve
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for in the go snack for the little one just anticipate #2
customer_reviews.author: Maricc567

customer_reviews.title: Get your kid to eat vegetables
customer_reviews.text: My kid is over three now, but she still loves these pouches of applesauce, and I don't mind buying them for her because at least then she gets some veggies. :) (And you can buy on Subscribe and Save and save 20%!)
customer_reviews.author: BWBoyer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter did not like it at all
customer_reviews.text: Could not get my child to like this. They all went to waste :(
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A delicious flavor and peas - what's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: great snacks
customer_reviews.text: If you need a healthier treat in your diet, get these products. They make you feel great; it's a heart/mind healthy treat that you will get hooked on. It's good for everyone and kids love them. Let's all make better choices because it's energizing and fun!! These are terrific!! You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, Great Dispenser/Container!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this stuff, and I've got to say they taste pretty great. The packaging is genius as well. You can't beat it for on the go convenience and as long as your child doesn't get too crazy with the container, it's fairly mess free as well. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: wonderful producr
customer_reviews.text: Our son is a pretty picky eater so veggies are mainly out of the question. This is a painless way for him to have a snack and get in nutrients. Love them and all of the different flavors! Plus he loves the bunny on the front
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good eat
customer_reviews.text: this is the only way my little one eats spinach. he can't eat it raw, since he only has 4 teeth, and he doesn't like it sautéed.
customer_reviews.author: olena

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love the fruit and veggie pouches!
customer_reviews.text: These are a dream! Fruit and veggies for my little one in a fun and easy to use pouch - yes please! My daughter cannot get enough of these tasty Peter Rabbit Organics pouches. Plus it makes me feel great knowing that I am giving her snacks that are good for her. Great work guys!
customer_reviews.author: M.E.F.

customer_reviews.title: I received expired pouches
customer_reviews.text: I received a box of Peter Rabbit Organics and only 1 of them hadn't expired!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Peter Rabbit Organics, Pea, Spinach and Apple Puree, 4.4-Ounce Pouches (Pack of 10)
product_meta.description: Naturally wholesome, healthy snacks for kids! USDA Certified Organic and Non-GMO ingredients.
feature_bullets: Naturally wholesome, healthy snacks for kids! USDA Certified Organic and Non-GMO ingredients.
INGREDIENTS: Organic peas, organic spinach, organic apples, organic lemon juice concentrate.
Convenient squeezable pouch with BPA free packaging, no need to chill
Perfect for toddlers but suitable for everyone from 6 months old

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
